item.title: Version 1.5.0
item.description: New UI: Enjoy a modern and intuitive interface for an enhanced user experience. Onboarding Flow: Introducing a new onboarding process for a seamless introduction to our features. Fixes: We've resolved various issues, ensuring a smoother and more stable application.
